alert.note: Alert for Dixon Entrance to Cape Decision Coastal Area; Eastern Baranof Island and Southern Admiralty Island; Eastern Chichagof Island; Glacier Bay; Juneau Borough and Northern Admiralty Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 26 at 5:35AM AKST until January 26 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST TODAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Juneau, Glacier Bay, western Prince of Wales Island, and portions of the central Inner Channels including Craig, Klawock, Hydaburg, Hoonah, Gustavus, Tenakee Springs, Angoon, and Edna Bay. * WHEN...Until noon AKST today. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. Aviation and marine transportation will also be impacted. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Fog will likely thin through the day.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Dixon Entrance to Cape Decision Coastal Area; Eastern Baranof Island and Southern Admiralty Island; Eastern Chichagof Island; Glacier Bay; Juneau Borough and Northern Admiralty Island
